title: Just the Right Notes
description: Elliot is an up and coming architect who just opened his own firm. His lover Graham is a composer and conductor. They share their love and lives in a beautiful house designed by Elliot, and whenever things get too hard to handle, they run away to their little cabin getaway where Elliot becomes Dom to Graham's needy little sub.When things at Elliot's firm begin to crumble, Graham needs to be the strong one, the one to suggest the cottage and the games they play there, knowing Elliot's role as Dom will give him strength, that their games will recharge his lover. And together they keep working to find that precarious balance in their lives until an accident threatens to change everything. Will Elliot and Graham's love see them through and keep the music in their lives?
author: Sean Michael
